graph.description: This graph's nodes are the SAE features that are active (i.e., whose activation is 0.5 or higher) on the final token of the prompt "Describe the process of machine learning, its applications in everyday life, and potential ethical concerns.". Its edges represent the similarity values of the pearson_correlation measure, computed over 10M tokens with activation threshold None (absolute values below 0.1 are clamped to zero). The explanations of the features are created by GPT-3.5-turbo and downloaded from Neuronpedia.

nodes.explanation: sentences ending with a period followed by a high activation value, potentially indicating the end of a statement or thought
phrases related to emotional reactions or attitudes
sentences that end with a period
sentences ending in a specific punctuation mark
sentence endings in the form of periods or other punctuation marks
phrases related to different aspects of policy and decision-making
phrases related to epic battles or confrontations
mentions related to technical tasks and instructions
text related to social issues and politics
sentences with a focused message or a call to action
statements related to discussion or analysis of specific topics
